page.qtext: Establishing narrative - A bird lands on the sill of your open bedroom window with a note in its beak. You greet the bird - "Oh! Hey little guy. Let's see what you've got there"
You pet the bird and introduce yourself - "Hi there! I'm NPC1. You must be delivering something important if you're here before breakfast. Let me see this note..."
You read the note. "NPC1 - Need your help. Come see me as soon as you wake up. - NPC2." That's a little vague - NPC2 isn't usally so dramatic. You decide you better go see what the old bear needs.
page.a1text: Thank the bird and head to NPC2's den

page.qtext: Arriving you see NPC2 and ask "Hey - is everything okay?". NPC2 replies "Yes, yes... I trust the messenger bird reached your home? Good. Thank you for coming on such short notice. I had to... well... see for yourself" and with that, NPC2 gestures towards a top hat on a table
page.a3text: Annoyed at OP2 you blurt out "You woke me up for this?"

page.qtext: NPC2 starts "This hat arrived via messenger bird last night. Just the hat - no note. No indication of who sent it" "A gift perhaps?" NPC1 offers "Top hats aren't exactly my style. It is THE MOST FAMOUS HAT EVER!"
It's Frosty's hat chump! Now pay attention. You need to find Frosty up north
page.a2text: This has to be a mistake

page.qtext: We were friends in elementary school - mind your business. Maybe there's a secret message on the hat. He used to be into that kinda stuff
Maybe. We need more information. Maybe there's more information we can glean from the hat
Yeah, I don't get it either. Want to stare at the hat a while longer?
Nothing in the hat. Let's check out the holly
Nothing up with the brim. How about that holly
HOLY CRAP! Magic holly juice squirted on the wall writing a message - "It's me Frosty, Avalanche is up here and he's just the worst"
page.a1text: An avalanche? Those happen all the time. Frosty needs to calm down
page.a2text: Yup - that all makes perfect sense

page.qtext: Not "An Avalanche" - this is a super angry snowman. Elves and snowmen don't get along and Avalanche's response is to try and murder elves whenever he can
Yup. I assume you know all about Avalanche's beef with the elves?
Um... I think you just had a seizure. Anyways, Avalanche is a snowman that's super duper upset with elves
Um... you are a snowman
page.a1text: Oh, yeah. I meant elves. Elves are jerks

page.qtext: There might be slightly more to it than that
Sure. Let's go with that. Someone needs to save Frosty and I'm super old
page.a2text: Yeah, I'm going to head out and take a nap. Good luck with all that

page.qtext: Radical. Find Mr. Cinnamon in town. He's a giant anthropomorphosized cookie so... pretty hard to miss
page.a2text: What chance do we stand against Avalanche?

page.qtext: You go home and take a nap. When you wake up Avalanche has murdered every living thing in the arctic circle. Um. Besides you. And then he murders you too.
